attributes.action: Keep the right to protest in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to act on the incoming changes to the right to protest.
attributes.background: I feel the government is infringing on our human rights that have been here for hundreds of years.I like a lot of people feel our freedom is being eroded by this government.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Stop new powers limiting repeat protests" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/745745
